name: Master's Treasure
description:
In the dark world of monsters there exists another side to the heroes that many do not consider. They run around saving people but did you know they are horrible thieves and dinner thieves? I didn't think so!

I, Turrios, have been tasked by my master to guard his treasure and add to it from those that come seeking it.

With my trusty battleaxe I am ready.

Controls:

Movement - Arrow keys

Jump - Spacebar

Attack - Z key

Ludum Dare Page: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=preview&uid=51253
